thread.section_title: Keep&Share Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keep&Share | keepandshare.com | 2 of 20
thread.title: Lynx

author: Lynx
title: Lynx
text: Tried the calendar, to do list, & discussion (where I file notes on projects). The todo lists are the easiest I've ever used. Rank by priority; hide completed tasks. Very good choices. I like that calendar can repeat events at odd intervals (say every third week, rather than every 3rd Wednesday of the month). Calendar particularly useful on crowded-schedule days because I can slice hours by the quarter.
